page.title: 07Waterside House,Craigavon
page.content: Waterside House is a residential hostel situated beside Kinnegoe Marina and overlooking Lough Neagh. Groups of about thirty can be accommodated here in considerable comfort. The House is used mainly by youth organisations,who can use the surroundings to partake in many activities. The nature of the area attracts a very wide variety of animals,many of them quite rare,and the development of the area provides many facilities to study them at close range. Help in the study of the area is given by guides who work there. Groups staying at the House can also take part in the many sports available and can obtain qualified instruction in each.
